name: Pitstop (itch)
description:
A rogue-lite strategic racer in which you race the tracks to break your previous lap records. Use the power-ups to repair your car and finish laps efficiently.

The game was one of the jam entries for Global Game Jam 2020 - Bangalore.

Instructions:

  • Use Q to boost the car with nitros.
  • Use E to switch lanes using handling.
  • Choose health if you're running low on engine power.

Team Members:

  • Game Designer / Artist: daspruthvi96 (GGJ / Itch.io)
  • Game Designer: Pawan Singh Sandhar
  • Game Programmer: nivarthiakhil
